statements: SELECT * FROM dapp_statistics WHERE dapp_id = '9381b1b5-008e-4b2b-9e64-0d6a4204ffa7';
SELECT user_id, successful_requests FROM dapp_statistics WHERE total_requests > 100;
SELECT dapp_id, date_created FROM dapp_statistics WHERE user_engagement_score > 0.8 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_requests, successful_requests FROM dapp_statistics ORDER BY total_requests DESC, successful_requests ASC;
SELECT AVG(user_engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM dapp_statistics WHERE dapp_id = 'ec7fd1ee-8a53-4b49-952c-3da7f9b0a5be';
SELECT * FROM dapp_statistics WHERE dapp_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT dapp_id, user_engagement_score, successful_requests FROM dapp_statistics WHERE total_requests > 100 AND user_engagement_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, total_requests, successful_requests FROM dapp_statistics WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC, total_requests DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM dapp_statistics WHERE successful_requests >= 50 GROUP BY dapp_id;
SELECT dapp_id, AVG(user_engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM dapp_statistics GROUP BY dapp_id HAVING AVG(total_requests) > 2000 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM dapp_usage_statistics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT dapp_name, usage_count FROM dapp_usage_statistics WHERE engagement_level > 50;
SELECT user_id, SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage FROM dapp_usage_statistics GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE network_type = 'public' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT network_name, COUNT(*) AS total_networks FROM blockchain_network GROUP BY network_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM dapp_usage_statistics WHERE engagement_level > 5 ORDER BY usage_count DESC;
SELECT dapp_name, usage_count FROM dapp_usage_statistics WHERE user_id = 123456 AND engagement_level = 3;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM blockchain_network WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY network_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_networks FROM blockchain_network WHERE network_type = 'public';
SELECT dapp_name, usage_count, engagement_level FROM dapp_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count >= 100 ORDER BY dapp_name ASC, engagement_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM dapp_usage_stats;
SELECT user_id, dapp_name, total_sessions FROM dapp_usage_stats WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT dapp_name, total_sessions FROM dapp_usage_stats ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM user_engagement GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT network_id, block_height, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_network WHERE miner_address = '0x123abc' ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM dapp_usage_stats WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT dapp_name, total_sessions FROM dapp_usage_stats WHERE total_transactions > 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_sessions) AS total_sessions FROM dapp_usage_stats GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE block_height IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT user_id, engagement_metric, MAX(engagement_value) AS max_engagement_value FROM user_engagement GROUP BY user_id, engagement_metric;
SELECT * FROM dapp_users;
SELECT username, email FROM dapp_users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, date_joined FROM dapp_users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT * FROM dapp_sessions WHERE session_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM dapp_activities WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM dapp_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM dapp_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, date_joined FROM dapp_users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT * FROM dapp_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM dapp_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM dapp_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM dapp_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM dapp_users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_time FROM dapp_transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM dapp_blocks WHERE block_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username FROM dapp_users;
SELECT * FROM dapp_sessions WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_time FROM dapp_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM dapp_contracts WHERE deploy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM dapp_blocks ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC;
